reviews.review: ta bien
Un juego muy bueno, entretenido, con una historia bastante buena se los recomiendo a todos que jugaron portal o apenas van a jugar esta saga
awesome
Plenty of quality fun content to be had here. Play alone and with a friend to get the most out of the game.

I love Portal 2. And not just for one or a few reasons, but everything about it. I love the test elements, how they are put together, the characters, their development, the games atmosphere, and everything else about it.

    The puzzles may seem difficult and confusing at times, but when you get it, it's extremely satisfying. In addition to this, when playing in cooperative mode, it is even more enjoyable to find out the solution together as you try things and fail until it finally clicks.

    In conclusion, the games flow and the story line help develop the perfect game. This all combined in the way that it is makes Portal 2 the great game that it is. Thank you for reading.

Portal 2 is one of the best puzzle games out there combined with nice graphics and beautiful stages. It also includes plenty of humor to go along side an interesting story line. 
Portal 2 will leave you with a very satisfied experience.
Totally recommended !

It has complex puzzle solving and an amazing story that is much better than the first game. It is pretty easy, most obvious during the final boss, but it's still a fun and engaging game. It's setting in the now destroyed research facility from the first game is an amazing location for this game to take place. Overall, if you liked Portal 1, you'll like Portal 2 even better!
